This workspace contains the DAKA News Terminal front-end project created manually because the Vite scaffolding step was blocked on this machine.

- Use React + TypeScript for components.
- Keep the layout in columns by country and source; each item opens in a side panel.
- Prioritize accessibility and fast loading.
- Use feature flags for external feed integrations; do not include API keys in the repository.
